verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of David.) I was glad <S%H8055><s%> when they said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Let us go <S%H1980><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"
Our feet <S%H7272><s%> are standing <S%H5975><s%> Within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> O Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%>
Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> that is built <S%H1129><s%> As a city <S%H5892><s%> that is compact <S%H2266><s%> together; <S%H9191><s%>

To which <S%H8033><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up, even the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the Lord <S%H3050><s%> – An ordinance <S%H5715><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%> – To give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
For there <S%H8033><s%> thrones <S%H3678><s%> were set <S%H3427><s%> for judgment, <S%H4941><s%> The thrones <S%H3678><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>
Pray <S%H7592><s%> for the peace <S%H7965><s%> of Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> "May they prosper <S%H7951><s%> who love <S%H157><s%> you.
"May peace <S%H7965><s%> be within your walls, <S%H2426><s%> And prosperity <S%H7962><s%> within your palaces. <S%H759><s%>"
For the sake <S%H4616><s%> of my brothers <S%H251><s%> and my friends, <S%H7453><s%> I will now <S%H4994><s%> say, <S%H1696><s%> "May peace <S%H7965><s%> be within you."
For the sake <S%H4616><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> I will seek <S%H1245><s%> your good. <S%H9185><s%>
